sentence.Network_en: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
sentence.Network_cn: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

sentence.Network_en: My mother has had unsightly varicose veins for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 我母亲多年来一直患有难看的静脉曲张。

sentence.Network_en: It works only in the veins, where the blood flow is slower.
sentence.Network_cn: 它只在静脉里起作用，在静脉中血液流动更慢一些。

i feel the fire burning in my veins ., 我感到烈焰在我血液里燃烧.

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 作者：霜月佳代子 状态：完结 章节：2话 类型：少女漫画内容简介 平凡的女高中生美夏喜欢上了天才小提琴教师秋月。而秋月却有着“一旦记忆就永远不会忘记”的能力，为了掩埋小时候目睹母亲死亡的记忆，他让自己不断去记忆乐谱，用“记忆”去“忘记”，不让任何事情来妨碍自己的记忆……人物简介 日高美夏 高中生，喜欢上教自己小提琴的音乐老师。 秋月秀明 教美夏小提琴的音乐老师，21岁，拥有一旦记忆就永远不会忘记的

entry.def: Your veins are the thin tubes in your body through which your blood flows towards your heart.

example.ex: Many veins are found just under the skin.
example.tran: 许多静脉血管就在皮肤下面。

entry.tran: （行文的）风格;（说话的）语气，情绪
entry.def: Something that is written or spoken in a particular vein is written or spoken in that style or mood.

example.ex: It is one  of his finest works in a lighter vein...
example.tran: 这是他行文风格轻松活泼的作品中最出色的作品之一。

example.ex: The girl now replies in similar vein.
example.tran: 这个女孩现在以相似的口吻回答。

entry.tran: 几分，若干（指在某人的行为或工作中常表现出的某种品质）
entry.def: A vein of a particular quality is evidence of that quality which someone often shows in their behaviour or work.

example.ex: The striker's  rich vein of form this season has seen him net 32 goals...
example.tran: 这位前锋本赛季状态奇佳，进球已达到32个。

example.ex: This Spanish drama has a vein of black humour running through it.
example.tran: 这出西班牙戏剧自始至终都带有几分黑色幽默。

entry.def: A vein of a particular metal or mineral is a layer of it lying in rock.

example.ex: ...a rich and deep vein of limestone.
example.tran: 储量丰富的深层石灰石矿脉

entry.def: The veins on a leaf are the thin lines on it.

example.ex: ...the serrated edges and veins of the feathery leaves.
example.tran: 羽状叶子的锯齿边沿和纹理
